pullRequest.title: Issue #7740: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - JavadocStyle
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #7740: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - JavadocStyle
Diff report (finally here!): https://wltan.github.io/checkstyle-reports/2020-03-18/javadocstyle-detailast-regression/diff/
Discrepancies observed are due to logging column number where we previously did not.
Note that although there are seven calls to log as highlighted in #7740 (comment), this PR only fixes one of them as instructed in #7740 (comment). Please see the discussion on that thread for more details.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -162,7 +159,7 @@ * * *

- * Also, the filter does not support Javadoc checks: + * Also, the filter does not support suppression inside javadoc reported by Javadoc checks:

nodes.bodyText: It is possible we will have other checks join this list. Please move it to a field.
Do we need 2 streams? Does it make sense to combine them and the assignment of the Set?

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -102,13 +102,20 @@
                     "AtclauseOrder",
                     "JavadocBlockTagLocation",
                     "JavadocParagraph",
+                    "JavadocStyle",
                     "JavadocTagContinuationIndentation",
                     "MissingDeprecated",
                     "NonEmptyAtclauseDescription",
                     "SingleLineJavadoc",
                     "SummaryJavadoc"
     )));
 
+    // Older regex-based checks that are under INCOMPATIBLE_JAVADOC_CHECK_NAMES
+    // but not subclasses of AbstractJavadocCheck.
+    // Will eventually include JavadocMethodCheck and JavadocTypeCheck.

nodes.bodyText: ADDITIONAL does not really explain what this is. How about REGEXP_JAVADOC_CHECKS?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -102,13 +102,20 @@
                     "AtclauseOrder",
                     "JavadocBlockTagLocation",
                     "JavadocParagraph",
+                    "JavadocStyle",

                     "MissingDeprecated",

     )));
 
+    // Older regex-based checks that are under INCOMPATIBLE_JAVADOC_CHECK_NAMES
+    // but not subclasses of AbstractJavadocCheck.
+    // Will eventually include JavadocMethodCheck and JavadocTypeCheck.
+    private static final Set<Class<?>> ADDITIONAL_JAVADOC_CHECKS =
